lead_paragraph: The Rangers announced yesterday that they had agreed with defenseman Michal Rozsival on a two-year contract worth $2.1 million a season. Rozsival, 27, tied for the N.H.L. lead in plus-minus rating at plus-35 in 2005-6, his first full season with the team. Rozsival established career highs in games played (82), assists (25), points (30), plus-minus rating, penalty minutes (90) and shots on goal (115).
